splits.name: BofI Holding, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Oct 26, 2015. Record date Nov 6, 2015. Payable date Nov 17, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Nov 18, 2015. Implemented as stock dividend of three additional shares per share. Company later renamed to Axos Financial, Inc. (NYSE: AX) in October 2018.

splits.name: CF Industries Holdings, Inc.
splits.notes: Board declared 5-for-1 split on May 15, 2015. Record date Jun 1, 2015. Distribution date Jun 17, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 18, 2015. Effected as stock dividend of four additional shares per share.

splits.name: Ctrip.com International, Ltd.
splits.notes: ADS ratio change from 4 ADSs per ordinary share to 8 ADSs per ordinary share. Announced Nov 18, 2015. Record date Nov 30, 2015. Effective on books Dec 1, 2015. Price adjustment (ex-date) Dec 2, 2015. Company later changed ticker from CTRP to TCOM in Oct 2019.

splits.name: The Ensign Group, Inc.
splits.notes: Board approved Dec 9, 2015. Stock dividend payable on or about Dec 23, 2015 to shareholders of record Dec 17, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 24, 2015.

splits.name: Edwards Lifesciences Corporation
splits.notes: Announced Nov 19, 2015. Record date Nov 30, 2015. Shares distributed Dec 11, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 14, 2015. Outstanding shares increased from ~108M to ~216M.

splits.name: Global Payments Inc.
splits.notes: Two-for-one forward split effected as stock dividend. Announced alongside Q1 FY2016 earnings Oct 7, 2015. Record date Oct 21, 2015. Distribution date Nov 2, 2015.

splits.name: Hanesbrands Inc.
splits.notes: 4-for-1 forward split effected as stock dividend. Board approved Jan 27, 2015. Record date Feb 9, 2015. Distribution date Mar 3, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 4, 2015.

splits.name: The Kroger Co.
splits.notes: Board approved Jun 25, 2015. Record date Jul 6, 2015. Distribution date on or about Jul 13, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Jul 14, 2015. Fifth stock split in Kroger's history.

splits.name: New Jersey Resources Corporation
splits.notes: Record date Feb 6, 2015. Distribution after close Mar 3, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 4, 2015.

splits.name: NIKE, Inc.
splits.notes: Two-for-one split of both Class A and Class B Common shares. Announced Nov 19, 2015 alongside $12B share repurchase program. Record date Dec 9, 2015. Stock dividend payable Dec 23, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Dec 24, 2015.

splits.name: PPG Industries, Inc.
splits.notes: Announced Apr 16, 2015. Record date May 11, 2015. Stock dividend distributed Jun 12, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Jun 15, 2015.

splits.name: Starbucks Corporation
splits.notes: 6th two-for-one split since 1992 IPO. Board approved Mar 17, 2015. Record date Mar 30, 2015. Distribution date Apr 8, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Apr 9, 2015.

splits.name: Southern Missouri Bancorp, Inc.
splits.notes: 2-for-1 split in the form of a 100% common stock dividend. Announced Jan 2, 2015. Record date Jan 16, 2015. Payable on or about Jan 30, 2015.

splits.name: Visa Inc.
splits.notes: 4-for-1 forward split of Class A common stock via stock dividend. Board approved Jan 29, 2015. Record date Feb 13, 2015. Three additional shares distributed Mar 18, 2015. Split-adjusted trading began Mar 19, 2015.
